card.description: President Joe Biden's top science adviser Dr. Eric Lander resigned Monday, hours after the White House confirmed that an internal investigation found credible evidence that he mistreated his staff.  An internal review last year, prompted by a workplace complaint, found evidence that Lander, the director of the Office of Science and Technology Policy and science adviser to Biden, bullied staffers and treated them disrespectfully.  The White House rebuked Lander over his interactions with his staff, but initially signaled Monday that he would be allowed to remain on the job, despite Biden‚Äôs Inauguration Day assertion that he expected ‚Äúhonesty and decency‚Äù from all who worked for his administration and would fire anyone who shows disrespect to others ‚Äúon the spot.‚Äù

card.title: National socialism - Conservapedia

_source.content: Looking back at Eric Cartman..... I still debate whether Cartman is conservative or not. Like.... he's got a decent amount of conservatism, and while he claims he is anti-socialist, anti-environmentalist (additionally, we do see him as an anti-hippie person), and pro-gun, we do see him supporting the KKK (who were anti-gun) and the Nazis......who were triply socialist (albeit national socialists https://www.conservapedia.com/National_socialism), environmentalist (as seen with Hitler), and anti-gun.Both Mr. Garrison and Darryl Weathers I can say, are far more closer to conservatism than Eric Cartman. The latter is seen doing a lot of conservative things alongside displaying his southern pride (via the Confederacy flag; a flag liberals fear)... whereas the former is a lot to explain, but he was seen as being Trump incarnate in South Park (albeit Mr. Garrison happening to be gay instead of straight like Trump).The only thing that Mr. Garrison did is doing that KKK thing in at least two episodes.While Mr. Garrison rarely does it.... or at least his past self did, I still feel like Eric still does a bunch of nazi and KKK-related things a lot more often compared to Garrison.Not only that, Cartman broke into houses of BOTH liberals AND conservatives..... much like how your typical anarchist would.... and anarchy is as much of a liberal trait as big gov't because it eventually leads to that.Cartman even did a BLM type of thing in a few episodes (seen wearing a Token's Life Matters shirt; a parody of said hate group) as well as the video game titled South Park: The Fractured But Whole.Unlike Kyle Broflovski, who's socially liberal, but fiscally conservative; a libertarian (I guess the same applies to Stan when he is involved in politics due to being based off of Trey Parker), I guess we could say Eric Cartman is an authoritarian.....? (Is that what someone who's socially conservative and fiscally liberal be known as?)On the other hand, Cartman is sexually immoral as seen in his future self... though, we aren't really counting future selves, so that is out..... except Cartman tried to do with the truly conservative Butters Stotch; he tried to stick his penis in Butters mouth...... even though both of them are so young. Cartman was the sexually immoral one with Butters being the victim.We saw Cartman act like or admire Hitler in at least the first 10 seasons (last seen in WoW episode if I recall correctly), and IDK when we last saw Cartman's admiration for the KKK, but if we don't see that today, then could that mean....Did Cartman change? Did he BECOME conservative? Of course, he still rips on Kyle due to being Jewish...... but maybe that alludes to the fact a lot of people who have caused a lot of problems happen to be Jewish? Like the Rothschilds for example; additionally, Soros has Jewish blood despite being athiest. Both of them have caused problems in the country.Maybe Cartman became conservative, IDK. What do you guys think?
_source.contentraw:
Looking back at Eric Cartman..... I still debate whether Cartman is conservative or not. Like.... he's got a decent amount of conservatism, and while he claims he is anti-socialist, anti-environmentalist (additionally, we do see him as an anti-hippie person), and pro-gun, we do see him supporting the KKK (who were anti-gun) and the Nazis...

...who were triply socialist (albeit national socialists https://www.conservapedia.com/National_socialism), environmentalist (as seen with Hitler), and anti-gun.

Both Mr. Garrison and Darryl Weathers I can say, are far more closer to conservatism than Eric Cartman. The latter is seen doing a lot of conservative things alongside displaying his southern pride (via the Confederacy flag; a flag liberals fear)... whereas the former is a lot to explain, but he was seen as being Trump incarnate in South Park (albeit Mr. Garrison happening to be gay instead of straight like Trump).

The only thing that Mr. Garrison did is doing that KKK thing in at least two episodes.

While Mr. Garrison rarely does it.... or at least his past self did, I still feel like Eric still does a bunch of nazi and KKK-related things a lot more often compared to Garrison.

Not only that, Cartman broke into houses of BOTH liberals AND conservatives..... much like how your typical anarchist would.... and anarchy is as much of a liberal trait as big gov't because it eventually leads to that.

Cartman even did a BLM type of thing in a few episodes (seen wearing a Token's Life Matters shirt; a parody of said hate group) as well as the video game titled South Park: The Fractured But Whole.

Unlike Kyle Broflovski, who's socially liberal, but fiscally conservative; a libertarian (I guess the same applies to Stan when he is involved in politics due to being based off of Trey Parker), I guess we could say Eric Cartman is an authoritarian.....? (Is that what someone who's socially conservative and fiscally liberal be known as?)

On the other hand, Cartman is sexually immoral as seen in his future self... though, we aren't really counting future selves, so that is out..... except Cartman tried to do with the truly conservative Butters Stotch; he tried to stick his penis in Butters mouth...... even though both of them are so young. Cartman was the sexually immoral one with Butters being the victim.

We saw Cartman act like or admire Hitler in at least the first 10 seasons (last seen in WoW episode if I recall correctly), and IDK when we last saw Cartman's admiration for the KKK, but if we don't see that today, then could that mean....

Did Cartman change? Did he BECOME conservative? Of course, he still rips on Kyle due to being Jewish...... but maybe that alludes to the fact a lot of people who have caused a lot of problems happen to be Jewish? Like the Rothschilds for example; additionally, Soros has Jewish blood despite being athiest. Both of them have caused problems in the country.

Maybe Cartman became conservative, IDK. What do you guys think?

_source.content: "California‚Äôs statewide indoor mask mandate requirement will expire on Feb. 15 for vaccinated residents, officials announced on Feb. 7, citing a decline in Omicron virus variant cases.Unvaccinated residents will still be required to mask up indoors, along with those in certain statewide facilities, such as health care settings and K‚Äì12 schools.The move will have no immediate impact in Los Angeles County, which has a local indoor mask-wearing requirement in place. But the state‚Äôs move means the requirement will be lifted in counties that don‚Äôt have a mask mandate, such as Orange, San Diego, and Riverside counties.The announcement comes a week after Newsom, LA Mayor Eric Garcetti, and San Francisco Mayor London Breed were seen posing maskless with NBA star Magic Johnson at the Jan. 30 National Football Conference Championship game."https://www.theepochtimes.com/california-to-end-indoor-mask-requirement_4262967.html?utm_source=partner&utm_campaign=gp
_source.contentraw:
"California‚Äôs statewide indoor mask mandate requirement will expire on Feb. 15 for vaccinated residents, officials announced on Feb. 7, citing a decline in Omicron virus variant cases.

Unvaccinated residents will still be required to mask up indoors, along with those in certain statewide facilities, such as health care settings and K‚Äì12 schools.

The move will have no immediate impact in Los Angeles County, which has a local indoor mask-wearing requirement in place. But the state‚Äôs move means the requirement will be lifted in counties that don‚Äôt have a mask mandate, such as Orange, San Diego, and Riverside counties.

The announcement comes a week after Newsom, LA Mayor Eric Garcetti, and San Francisco Mayor London Breed were seen posing maskless with NBA star Magic Johnson at the Jan. 30 National Football Conference Championship game."

_source.content: Update: President Biden's top science adviser resigned Monday after reports that he bullied staffers and created a toxic workplace environment. After Eric Lander's apologetic email to staff last week made headlines, the White House initially said corrective action would be taken at the Office of Science and Technology Policy while Lander remained in his post, but now Lander has decided to step down no later than Feb. 18, Politico reports, calling this the most high-profile Biden administration departure yet.Our original story from Sunday follows:The president's top science adviser apparently likes to browbeat his staff. Politico reports that Cabinet member Eric Lander sent out an email to his 150 or so underlings on Friday in which he apologizes for speaking to them in a ‚Äúdisrespectful and demeaning way.‚Äù The email does not provide specific examples, but Politico notes that it is currently in the midst of an investigation into how Lander treats his staff.His apology‚Äîthe Daily Beast describes it as "groveling"‚Äîappears to be an attempt to get out in front of the story."It's my responsibility to set a respectful tone for our community," wrote Lander."It's clear that I have not lived up to this responsibility. This is not only wrong, but also inconsistent with our Safe and Respectful Workplace Policy. It is never acceptable for me to speak that way. I am deeply sorry for my conduct. I especially want to apologize to those of you who I treated poorly or were present at the time.‚Äù His boss, President Biden, promised on his first day in office that he would immediately fire anyone in his administration who treated colleagues with disrespect. "No ifs, ands, or buts."Lander is director of the White House Office of Science and Technology Policy, and his big project is heading Biden's "Cancer Moonshot." The goal is to cut the cancer death rate by 50% in 25 years. In an interview with NPR this week, Lander laid out some of the goals, including the formation of a "cancer cabinet" that he will lead. "The way you cure cancer is you cure it one bite at a time," he says. "It's 200 diseases, and there's enormous progress." (Biden elevated the post of science adviser to a Cabinet-level position.)
_source.contentraw:
Update: President Biden's top science adviser resigned Monday after reports that he bullied staffers and created a toxic workplace environment. After Eric Lander's apologetic email to staff last week made headlines, the White House initially said corrective action would be taken at the Office of Science and Technology Policy while Lander remained in his post, but now Lander has decided to step down no later than Feb. 18, Politico reports, calling this the most high-profile Biden administration departure yet.

Our original story from Sunday follows:

The president's top science adviser apparently likes to browbeat his staff. Politico reports that Cabinet member Eric Lander sent out an email to his 150 or so underlings on Friday in which he apologizes for speaking to them in a ‚Äúdisrespectful and demeaning way.‚Äù The email does not provide specific examples, but Politico notes that it is currently in the midst of an investigation into how Lander treats his staff.

His apology‚Äîthe Daily Beast describes it as "groveling"‚Äîappears to be an attempt to get out in front of the story."It's my responsibility to set a respectful tone for our community," wrote Lander.

"It's clear that I have not lived up to this responsibility. This is not only wrong, but also inconsistent with our Safe and Respectful Workplace Policy. It is never acceptable for me to speak that way. I am deeply sorry for my conduct. I especially want to apologize to those of you who I treated poorly or were present at the time.‚Äù His boss, President Biden, promised on his first day in office that he would immediately fire anyone in his administration who treated colleagues with disrespect. "No ifs, ands, or buts."Lander is director of the White House Office of Science and Technology Policy, and his big project is heading Biden's "Cancer Moonshot." The goal is to cut the cancer death rate by 50% in 25 years. In an interview with NPR this week, Lander laid out some of the goals, including the formation of a "cancer cabinet" that he will lead. "The way you cure cancer is you cure it one bite at a time," he says. "It's 200 diseases, and there's enormous progress." (Biden elevated the post of science adviser to a Cabinet-level position.)

card.description: NEW YORK (PIX11) ‚Äî Municipal workers in New York City who have not complied with the city‚Äôs COVID vaccine mandate will be terminated on Friday. On Aug. 2, all new hires were required to be fully va‚Ä¶
card.title: NYC COVID vaccine mandate deadline looms with thousands of jobs on the line

_source.content: NEW YORK: "Municipal workers in New York City who have not complied with the city‚Äôs COVID vaccine mandate will be terminated on Friday. On Aug. 2, all new hires were required to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment. Last week, separation letters were sent to all city workers who were not in compliance with the mandate. Anyone waiting on a religious exemption appeal will be allowed to stay. As the deadline looms, Mayor Eric Adams told PIX11 News in a statement on Monday that more than 90% of the city workforce was fully vaccinated, and that number keeps climbing. The state comptroller revealed the NYPD Detective Bureau has lost 5% of its personnel because of the COVID-19 pandemic. The vaccine mandate would cost the city an additional four detectives. Detectives Endowment Association President Paul DiGiacomo told PIX11 News on Monday the union plans to file a lawsuit. It remained unclear on Monday exactly how many of the city‚Äôs 370,000 workers were unvaccinated. A city spokesperson said the true number won‚Äôt be known until the deadline arrives."https://pix11.com/news/coronavirus/nyc-covid-vaccine-mandate-deadline-looms-with-thousands-of-jobs-on-the-line/
_source.contentraw:
NEW YORK: "Municipal workers in New York City who have not complied with the city‚Äôs COVID vaccine mandate will be terminated on Friday. On Aug. 2, all new hires were required to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment. Last week, separation letters were sent to all city workers who were not in compliance with the mandate. Anyone waiting on a religious exemption appeal will be allowed to stay. As the deadline looms, Mayor Eric Adams told PIX11 News in a statement on Monday that more than 90% of the city workforce was fully vaccinated, and that number keeps climbing. The state comptroller revealed the NYPD Detective Bureau has lost 5% of its personnel because of the COVID-19 pandemic. The vaccine mandate would cost the city an additional four detectives. Detectives Endowment Association President Paul DiGiacomo told PIX11 News on Monday the union plans to file a lawsuit. It remained unclear on Monday exactly how many of the city‚Äôs 370,000 workers were unvaccinated. A city spokesperson said the true number won‚Äôt be known until the deadline arrives."

The funding, which will allow Hobart Synagogue to install 14 CCTV cameras, was announced on Monday by Tasmanian Liberal Senator Eric Abetz.

Visiting the shule, which was consecrated in 1845, he said, ‚ÄúGiven the recent rise in antisemitic activity, it is good to see the extra protection being offered to this historic building and those who use it.‚Äù

Noting the funding was made available under the Safer Community Grant scheme and that there has been a notable increase in antisemitism, Abetz added, ‚ÄúIt is right and proper that this extra security be provided and while disappointed that it is needed, I‚Äôm pleased we‚Äôve been able to provide it.‚Äù

Welcoming the funding, shule president Jeff Schneider told The AJN, ‚ÄúWe are very grateful to receive this grant from the federal government and will use it to ensure the safety and security of our congregants. Also special thanks to CSG NSW for their assistance with our application.‚Äù

_source.content: New York Schools Forcing Kids to be Vegan on FridaysSnake Baker February 8, 2022https://youtu.be/7zk1a2JXrasHow is this slop supposed to be healthy?The new black Mayor of New York City, Eric Adams, could end up being just as goofy as Bill de Blasio.He‚Äôs a vegan and a vegan evangelist, and now he‚Äôs trying to force poor black children to become vegans. Veganism literally shrinks the brain. From the research I‚Äôve done, black people‚Äôs brains are already small enough.The last thing we need is smaller black brains.RT:---------------------------------------------------------------------------Parents of New York City schoolchildren have taken to social media to share photos of what they believe are inadequate school lunches. On Thursday, NYC Mayor Eric Adams mandated ‚Äòvegan Fridays‚Äô in all city public schools, claiming this would serve to improve public health.Judging by the photos posted on Twitter on the first meatless Friday, children were served dry black bean tacos, bags of fries, a banana along with stir fries and other packaged snacks.One parent said that while she, too, believed in the virtues of healthy eating, the kind of food served to schoolchildren on Friday did not fall into that category. Another twitter user said that ‚Äúmost of the kids dumped this in the garbage or just ate the cookies,‚Äù and complained that the meal ‚Äúsmelled like armpits & it was completely unappetizing.‚Äù However, according to Mayor Adams‚Äô office, the initiative is a success, with a statement on Friday claiming that ‚Äúparents, students and principals across the city have given positive feedback on today‚Äôs launch.‚Äù Officials insist that the change in public-school menus ‚Äúwill eventually improve the quality of life for thousands of New York City students.‚ÄùMoreover, city officials claim all the plant-based options on school menus have been taste-tested and approved in small groups of students.Under the new policy, which affects 930,000 New York public-school students, milk is still served with every meal as per federal USDA guidelines. Jenna Lyle, associate press secretary for the New York City Department of Education, assured the public that non-vegan items will also be available on request on Fridays, too.In fact, students have been able to opt for vegan meals in New York schools for a while already, including peanut butter, jelly sandwiches, hummus and pretzels. However, now all menus will be plant-based on Fridays.---------------------------------------------------------------------------Vegans only eat processed garbage.We‚Äôve all seen them. New York Schools Forcing Kids to be Vegan on Fridays

Snake Baker
February 8, 2022

https://youtu.be/7zk1a2JXras

How is this slop supposed to be healthy?

The new black Mayor of New York City, Eric Adams, could end up being just as goofy as Bill de Blasio.

He‚Äôs a vegan and a vegan evangelist, and now he‚Äôs trying to force poor black children to become vegans.

Veganism literally shrinks the brain. From the research I‚Äôve done, black people‚Äôs brains are already small enough.

The last thing we need is smaller black brains.

RT:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Parents of New York City schoolchildren have taken to social media to share photos of what they believe are inadequate school lunches. On Thursday, NYC Mayor Eric Adams mandated ‚Äòvegan Fridays‚Äô in all city public schools, claiming this would serve to improve public health.

Judging by the photos posted on Twitter on the first meatless Friday, children were served dry black bean tacos, bags of fries, a banana along with stir fries and other packaged snacks.

One parent said that while she, too, believed in the virtues of healthy eating, the kind of food served to schoolchildren on Friday did not fall into that category.

Another twitter user said that ‚Äúmost of the kids dumped this in the garbage or just ate the cookies,‚Äù and complained that the meal ‚Äúsmelled like armpits & it was completely unappetizing.‚Äù

However, according to Mayor Adams‚Äô office, the initiative is a success, with a statement on Friday claiming that ‚Äúparents, students and principals across the city have given positive feedback on today‚Äôs launch.‚Äù

Officials insist that the change in public-school menus ‚Äúwill eventually improve the quality of life for thousands of New York City students.‚Äù

Moreover, city officials claim all the plant-based options on school menus have been taste-tested and approved in small groups of students.

Under the new policy, which affects 930,000 New York public-school students, milk is still served with every meal as per federal USDA guidelines. Jenna Lyle, associate press secretary for the New York City Department of
Education, assured the public that non-vegan items will also be available on request on Fridays, too.

In fact, students have been able to opt for vegan meals in New York schools for a while already, including peanut butter, jelly sandwiches, hummus and pretzels. However, now all menus will be plant-based on Fridays.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Vegans only eat processed garbage.

We‚Äôve all seen them. Most of them are either anorexic looking, or they are ‚Äúskinny fat,‚Äù with flab and no muscle.

But maybe this is part of a plan to reduce black violence through brain shrinkage. Maybe there is secret research showing that a smaller brain would lead to less murder.

card.title: New York Democrat Tells the Abolish and Defund Police Crowds Their Goals Are 'Tone-Deaf'

_source.content: New York Democrat Tells the Abolish and Defund Police Crowds Their Goals Are 'Tone-Deaf' New York Congressman Ritchie Torres (D) told CNN on Saturday that what the Abolish and Defund the Police crowds want will not help inner-city communities deal with the surge in violent crime.CNN host Jim Acosta noted Torres had previously said the "defund the police" movement is dead in New York City, "and good riddance.""Since 2017, the murder rate in New York City is up by 60 percent. Shootings in January of 2022 are up by 30 percent compared to the same period last year. So there‚Äôs been an explosion of gun violence and calling for the police department to be defunded during an outbreak of gun violence is a little like calling for the fire department to be defunded during an outbreak of a fire. It comes off as profoundly tone-deaf and out of touch," Torres said. "The majority of Americans, the majority of Republicans and Democrats are in favor of reforming, rather than abolishing or even defunding the police. What most Americans want is not under-policing or over-policing, but better policing. More constitutional and accountable and transparent policing," he explained.Torres blamed the violent crime on firearms being brought in from out of state, which is why he says the federal government needs to implement more gun control on a national level because there's "a limit" to what new Mayor Eric Adams (D) can do."But one of the greatest challenges that we face to public safety is Republican obstructionism against gun safety," he added.https://townhall.com/tipsheet/juliorosas/2022/02/07/new-york-democrat-tells-the-abolishdefund-police-crowd-their-goals-are-tone-deaf-n2602939
_source.contentraw:
New York Democrat Tells the Abolish and Defund Police Crowds Their Goals Are 'Tone-Deaf'

New York Congressman Ritchie Torres (D) told CNN on Saturday that what the Abolish and Defund the Police crowds want will not help inner-city communities deal with the surge in violent crime.
CNN host Jim Acosta noted Torres had previously said the "defund the police" movement is dead in New York City, "and good riddance."

"Since 2017, the murder rate in New York City is up by 60 percent. Shootings in January of 2022 are up by 30 percent compared to the same period last year. So there‚Äôs been an explosion of gun violence and calling for the police department to be defunded during an outbreak of gun violence is a little like calling for the fire department to be defunded during an outbreak of a fire. It comes off as profoundly tone-deaf and out of touch," Torres said.
"The majority of Americans, the majority of Republicans and Democrats are in favor of reforming, rather than abolishing or even defunding the police. What most Americans want is not under-policing or over-policing, but better policing. More constitutional and accountable and transparent policing," he explained.
Torres blamed the violent crime on firearms being brought in from out of state, which is why he says the federal government needs to implement more gun control on a national level because there's "a limit" to what new Mayor Eric Adams (D) can do.
"But one of the greatest challenges that we face to public safety is Republican obstructionism against gun safety," he added.
https://townhall.com/tipsheet/juliorosas/2022/02/07/new-york-democrat-tells-the-abolishdefund-police-crowd-their-goals-are-tone-deaf-n2602939

_source.content: Newsmax Counter-Sues Smartmatic Over 2020 Election Reporting In November 2021 Smartmatic, an election technology and ballot counting company, sued Newsmax and OAN. This followed their previous lawsuit against FOX News.The former President of Smartmatic, Lord Mark Malloch, currently leads the George Soros Open Society Foundation.In August 2017 Smartmatic Director Antonio Mugica admitted during that the Smartmatic machines and software were tampered with and created at least one million phantom votes in the national elections in Venezuela.Another voting machine firm, Dominion Voting Systems Corp, has brought similar lawsuits against conservatives.The Gateway Pundit was sued by far-left Dominion executive Eric Coomer, a committed Trump-hater, for our reporting on his presentations to possible clients and links to Antifa.On Monday Newsmax TV countersued Smartmatic Corp denying they defamed the election voting systems company.Via far left Reuters:Right-wing U.S. television network Newsmax Media Inc on Monday countersued Smartmatic Corp, an election security firm that says it was defamed by Newsmax‚Äôs coverage of the 2020 presidential election.Smartmatic sued Newsmax in November for amplifying false claims that Smartmatic voting machines rigged the election against then-President Donald Trump, who persists in falsely claiming his defeat was the result of fraud.In a response filed in Delaware state court, San Diego-based Newsmax denied it defamed Smartmatic and claimed that the election software firm was trying to censor free speech and intimidate a critic.‚ÄúThe action brought by Smartmatic against Newsmax arises from and is because of Newsmax‚Äôs exercise of its right to free speech in connection with issues of public interest,‚Äù Newsmax‚Äôs lawyers said in the filing.A Smartmatic spokesperson did not immediately respond to a request for comment. https://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2022/02/breaking-newsmax-counter-sues-smartmatic-2020-election-reporting/
_source.contentraw:
Newsmax Counter-Sues Smartmatic Over 2020 Election Reporting

In November 2021 Smartmatic, an election technology and ballot counting company, sued Newsmax and OAN. This followed their previous lawsuit against FOX News.

The former President of Smartmatic, Lord Mark Malloch, currently leads the George Soros Open Society Foundation.

In August 2017 Smartmatic Director Antonio Mugica admitted during that the Smartmatic machines and software were tampered with and created at least one million phantom votes in the national elections in Venezuela.

Another voting machine firm, Dominion Voting Systems Corp, has brought similar lawsuits against conservatives.

The Gateway Pundit was sued by far-left Dominion executive Eric Coomer, a committed Trump-hater, for our reporting on his presentations to possible clients and links to Antifa.

On Monday Newsmax TV countersued Smartmatic Corp denying they defamed the election voting systems company.

Via far left Reuters:

Right-wing U.S. television network Newsmax Media Inc on Monday countersued Smartmatic Corp, an election security firm that says it was defamed by Newsmax‚Äôs coverage of the 2020 presidential election.

Smartmatic sued Newsmax in November for amplifying false claims that Smartmatic voting machines rigged the election against then-President Donald Trump, who persists in falsely claiming his defeat was the result of fraud.

In a response filed in Delaware state court, San Diego-based Newsmax denied it defamed Smartmatic and claimed that the election software firm was trying to censor free speech and intimidate a critic.

‚ÄúThe action brought by Smartmatic against Newsmax arises from and is because of Newsmax‚Äôs exercise of its right to free speech in connection with issues of public interest,‚Äù Newsmax‚Äôs lawyers said in the filing.

A Smartmatic spokesperson did not immediately respond to a request for comment. https://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2022/02/breaking-newsmax-counter-sues-smartmatic-2020-election-reporting/

card.title: Biden betraying the nation he ‚Äòleads‚Äô

_source.content: Biden betraying the nation he ‚Äòleads‚ÄôBy Eric UtterThe U.S. Army is going to immediately start discharging the unvaccinated. And this after attempting to purge itself of patriots, devout Christians, and Trump supporters. At this rate, the ‚Äúforce‚Äù may literally soon mirror its recruiting slogan of 2001-2006, which touted an ‚ÄúArmy Of One.‚Äù This seems particularly bizarre timing, given the fact that Uncle Sam believes Russia is going to invade Ukraine soon, and China is now openly threatening Taiwan.  The Biden administration has also pressured hospitals and businesses to get rid of their unvaccinated employees, putting more burden on already over-stressed doctors and nurses and worsening the ubiquitous labor shortages and supply chain disruptions. Moreover, Biden has canceled pipelines at home and devastated the energy sector‚Ä¶while begging for oil from Russia and OPEC nations. He has gifted the Taliban with tens of billions of dollars in advanced military equipment, making these erstwhile goat herders one of the best equipped military forces on the planet. He refuses to build a wall to protect his own nation‚Äôs southern border but is fine with others building walls to protect their interests. His administration will not lift a finger to defend the sovereignty of America‚Äôs border with Mexico but apparently considers Ukraine‚Äôs border with Russia to be absolutely inviolate.But wait, there‚Äôs more‚Ä¶as they say in late-night infomercials. Biden and his Cabinet of Fools have coddled criminals and criminalized victims, leading to vastly more of each. They will raise taxes on productive United States citizens while giving freebies to illegal aliens. They have locked down the healthy, mocked the productive, and turned ethnic groups and races against each other. They have weaponized the FBI, CIA, DOJ‚Äîand assorted other agencies formerly charged with protecting Americans‚Äîand directed them to surveil and harass them. They have stunted the American economy-- and destroyed their nation‚Äôs prestige around the world.Biden and his minions have deliberately prostrated America in front of Russia, China, Iran‚Ä¶and the rest of the world. Especially China. https://www.americanthinker.com/blog/2022/02/biden_betraying_the_nation_he_leads.html
_source.contentraw:
Biden betraying the nation he ‚Äòleads‚Äô
By Eric Utter

The U.S. Army is going to immediately start discharging the unvaccinated. And this after attempting to purge itself of patriots, devout Christians, and Trump supporters. At this rate, the ‚Äúforce‚Äù may literally soon mirror its recruiting slogan of 2001-2006, which touted an ‚ÄúArmy Of One.‚Äù This seems particularly bizarre timing, given the fact that Uncle Sam believes Russia is going to invade Ukraine soon, and China is now openly threatening Taiwan.

The Biden administration has also pressured hospitals and businesses to get rid of their unvaccinated employees, putting more burden on already over-stressed doctors and nurses and worsening the ubiquitous labor shortages and supply chain disruptions.

Moreover, Biden has canceled pipelines at home and devastated the energy sector‚Ä¶while begging for oil from Russia and OPEC nations. He has gifted the Taliban with tens of billions of dollars in advanced military equipment, making these erstwhile goat herders one of the best equipped military forces on the planet. He refuses to build a wall to protect his own nation‚Äôs southern border but is fine with others building walls to protect their interests. His administration will not lift a finger to defend the sovereignty of America‚Äôs border with Mexico but apparently considers Ukraine‚Äôs border with Russia to be absolutely inviolate.

But wait, there‚Äôs more‚Ä¶as they say in late-night infomercials. Biden and his Cabinet of Fools have coddled criminals and criminalized victims, leading to vastly more of each. They will raise taxes on productive United States citizens while giving freebies to illegal aliens. They have locked down the healthy, mocked the productive, and turned ethnic groups and races against each other. They have weaponized the FBI, CIA, DOJ‚Äîand assorted other agencies formerly charged with protecting Americans‚Äîand directed them to surveil and harass them. They have stunted the American economy-- and destroyed their nation‚Äôs prestige around the world.

Biden and his minions have deliberately prostrated America in front of Russia, China, Iran‚Ä¶and the rest of the world. Especially China. https://www.americanthinker.com/blog/2022/02/biden_betraying_the_nation_he_leads.html

card.title: Joe Rogan's Huge Rumble Offer: BTS of the Game-Changer Move Revealed | Direct Message | Rubin Report

Dave shares Joe Rogan‚Äôs apology and his explanation of these old clips. What began as an accusation of spreading misinformation has now turned into a campaign to destroy Rogan. Dave shares the behind the scenes details of the Rumble board meeting that led to the game-changing $100 million offer for Rogan to leave Spotify for Rumble as well as how his own ‚Äúwhy I left the left‚Äù political evolution is more relevant than ever. Dave also shares the reactions of Bari Weiss, Eric Weinstein, Bret Weinstein, Jordan Peterson, Krystal Ball, Glenn Greenwald and others.Editorial:   IMHO...  Good God...  What are we doing today?!"Racist" is The word to call anyone when they don't know anything else to call them!   This Racist crap has gone too far!When I was younger, I learned a little...I learned that a Caucasian were white,Mexican were brown,Chinese were a light brown with squinty eyes,Indians were Red skins, andNegroes were black.There was NOTHING wrong or Racist about describing those Races in just plain English!Now, the real "RACIST" names one can be called are DIFFERENT from those names...  Like "wet backs", Nazis, Gringos, Nigger, etc.  These names are RACIST names describing Races in a Bad Way!Now we hear "The N word" implying Negro when there is NOTHING WRONG WITH IT!Maybe The "N" word means Nigger...  which, IMHO, IS A RACIST name.But, when the word Negro is used, it is NOT, in a RACIST WAY...So, why in hell are we making such a BIG THING of calling someone a Negro, when there is NOTHING WRONG WITH IT?!I think it's time to STOP using the word RACIST so much as an excuse when nothing else can be thought of to use.This Joe Rogan stuff is completely blown out of proportion!  He is NOT a racist...  He was NOT defaming Negroes at all!It's time to STOP this Racist BS!OK, I am off my soap box!https://rumble.com/vue6fn-joe-rogans-huge-rumble-offer-bts-of-the-game-changer-move-revealed-direct-m.html?mref=6zof&mrefc=2
_source.contentraw:
Joe Rogan's Huge Rumble Offer: BTS of the Game-Changer Move Revealed | Direct Message | Rubin Report
The Rubin Report
Published February 8, 2022
Dave Rubin of ‚ÄúThe Rubin Report‚Äù talks about the growing Joe Rogan controversy and Rumble‚Äôs $100 million dollar offer to leave Spotify. Calls for Spotify to censor or dump Joe Rogan are growing louder. Now he is accused of being a racist as an out-of-context video compilation of him using a racial slur went viral. Dave shares Joe Rogan‚Äôs apology and his explanation of these old clips. What began as an accusation of spreading misinformation has now turned into a campaign to destroy Rogan. Dave shares the behind the scenes details of the Rumble board meeting that led to the game-changing $100 million offer for Rogan to leave Spotify for Rumble as well as how his own ‚Äúwhy I left the left‚Äù political evolution is more relevant than ever. Dave also shares the reactions of Bari Weiss, Eric Weinstein, Bret Weinstein, Jordan Peterson, Krystal Ball, Glenn Greenwald and others.

Editorial: IMHO... Good God... What are we doing today?!
"Racist" is The word to call anyone when they don't know anything else to call them! This Racist crap has gone too far!
When I was younger, I learned a little...
I learned that a Caucasian were white,
Mexican were brown,
Chinese were a light brown with squinty eyes,
Indians were Red skins, and
Negroes were black.
There was NOTHING wrong or Racist about describing those Races in just plain English!
Now, the real "RACIST" names one can be called are DIFFERENT from those names... Like "wet backs", Nazis, Gringos, Nigger, etc. These names are RACIST names describing Races in a Bad Way!

Now we hear "The N word" implying Negro when there is NOTHING WRONG WITH IT!
Maybe The "N" word means Nigger... which, IMHO, IS A RACIST name.
But, when the word Negro is used, it is NOT, in a RACIST WAY...

So, why in hell are we making such a BIG THING of calling someone a Negro, when there is NOTHING WRONG WITH IT?!

I think it's time to STOP using the word RACIST so much as an excuse when nothing else can be thought of to use.
This Joe Rogan stuff is completely blown out of proportion! He is NOT a racist... He was NOT defaming Negroes at all!
It's time to STOP this Racist BS!
OK, I am off my soap box!

Eric Weinstein @EricRWeinstein - Math guy. MD at Thiel Capital. Host of The Portal.

Organized civil disobedience is the correct next response to the prolonged, indefinite and deliberate abuse of exotic emergency powers inconsistent with being a free people in our own country.

I don‚Äôt want to go there, but it is time.
We are going to have to get CCP influence out of our country. We are going to have to get Fauci and Daszak to explain what we were doing in Wuhan. We are going to have to drive Pfizer out of news sponsorship. We are going to have to extend freedom of speech to digital speech.

We are going to need algorithmic transparency from Twitter through regulation. We are going to need to rein in the Feds ability to print its way into crushing the working class through seignorage and blowing out income inequality for holders of risk assets.

We are going to need to scale back our military obligations so we can actually be counted upon by our partners. We are going to need to prohibit the Whitehouse from attempting to label those who raise the president‚Äôs cognitive decline as ‚ÄúPurveyors of misinformation.‚Äù

We are going to need hearings on the intelligence community and it‚Äôs relationship to pedophiles like Jeff Epstein endangering our children. We are going to need the receipts and federal securities filings from his likely non-existent hedge fund. We need student debt forgiveness.

We are going to need to love Gen Z and the Millenials harder so that they have the economic wherewithal to raise their children. We are going to need to retire people in positions of power who have held power for decades into states incompatible with the demands of their offices.

We are going to have to liberate our scientists with full academic freedom and wealth so they can level with us. We are going to have to push for what ‚ÄúBuild back better‚Äù and ‚ÄúGreat Reset‚Äù actually mean to the Stepford leaders who repeat it as mantra.

We‚Äôre going to have to release Twitter activists from the protections we established for journalists who obey the SPJ code of ethics in trying to report news as news rather than opinion‚Ä¶ or worse. We are going to have to face this climate crisis without strongarming consensus.

We are going to need nearly FULL transparency on repeated hypersonic invasion of our military airspace by unknown actors with data given to physicists. We are going to need to know what quiet deal we had with the Taliban and ISI around the absurd Afghanistan pullout by US forces.

We are going to have to take back our research universities so that they can do research. We need to severely limit the number of administrators and adjunct/student workers and costly journals and debt financing for educations. We need student debt to be discharged in bankruptcy.


One more @
https://threadreaderapp.com/thread/1490544013279051776.html

And he saith unto him, Friend, how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment? And he was speechless.

Then said the king to the servants, Bind him hand and foot, and take him away, and cast him into outer darkness; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.

For many are called, but few are chosen.

_source.contentraw:
Lesson Six
INVASION OF THE BODY SNATCHERS

Have you ever watched a mother communicate with her child?
She will talk to it in a cutesy little snuggly wuggly voice that, if she used it on another adult, the other person would believe either she was neurotic or she was mocking him.

The communication transactions (sometimes called strokes) between the 3 ego states are very distinct. Adults speak to other adults in a certain way. Children speak to parents in a certain way. If I was on the street and an 8-year-old approached me asking, ‚ÄúDo you know where my Mommy is?‚Äù I would respond quite differently than if a cop asked me the same question. For the child, I would change my ego state from adult to parent and answer like one. If you eaves drop on a conversation amongst children you know the subject matter, exchange, and intent of the transaction is very different from an adult conversation.

The concept of transactional psychology ‚Äì as the psychologists entitled it was made popular in a book by Eric Berne in the 1980s entitled Games People Play. It describes how seemingly adult people would ‚Äúaccidentally‚Äù slip into a child ego state and stop acting like rational adults. It would confuse the adults around them because as far as they were concerned their adult friend/coworker/spouse was still there but his mind was hijacked, much like invasion of the body snatchers. He called these ‚Äúslips‚Äù games thus the theory of human gaming.

What are the supposed games people play?
The subject is too lengthy to detail here. The book is an easy read if you are curious.
Here are a few game titles to give you the general flavor.

"Now I've Got You, You Son of a Bitch,"
"Why does this always happen to me?‚Äù
‚ÄúSee what you made me do‚Äù
‚ÄúIf it weren't for you‚Äù
‚ÄúLook how hard I've tried‚Äù
‚ÄúLet's you and him fight‚Äù
and my favorite
‚ÄúLet's pull a fast one on Joey‚Äù

The titles are clever summations of the games as if a child would name them since it is the child ego state that initiates them.

These games often have tragic ends such as divorce, jail, the hospital, or the morgue for one or both of the people involved. The really alarming part is that _the initiator of the game does not even realize what he/she is doing_**. It is all subconscious. So when I tell you it is possible for adults to slip into a child ego state it is not speculation on my part. In fact, like VAERS underreporting, this is more than common ‚Äì it should be expected ‚Äì even without deliberate hypnotism.

Joe South understood the 3 ego states. He may not have delineated them as such but he definitely had insight into some of the dynamics of the interactions.

‚ÄúOh we make one another cry
Break a heart then we say goodbye
Cross our hearts and we hope to die
That the other was to blame‚Äù

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cFK9MIS-5nc

What you have just learned in the last 2 lessons is the key to illuminati mind control.

Now let me prove it.

https://gab.com/thelastfreemindinapostQworld/posts/107761238361318036

_source.plainmarkdown:
Lesson Six
***INVASION OF THE BODY SNATCHERS***

Have you ever watched a mother communicate with her child?
She will talk to it in a cutesy little snuggly wuggly voice that, if she used it on another adult, the other person would believe either she was neurotic or she was mocking him.

The communication transactions (sometimes called strokes) between the 3 ego states are very distinct. Adults speak to other adults in a certain way. Children speak to parents in a certain way. If I was on the street and an 8-year-old approached me asking, ‚ÄúDo you know where my Mommy is?‚Äù I would respond quite differently than if a cop asked me the same question. For the child, I would change my ego state from adult to parent and answer like one. If you eaves drop on a conversation amongst children you know the subject matter, exchange, and intent of the transaction is very different from an adult conversation.

The concept of ***transactional psychology*** ‚Äì as the psychologists entitled it was made popular in a book by Eric Berne in the 1980s entitled ***Games People Play***. It describes how seemingly adult people would ‚Äúaccidentally‚Äù slip into a child ego state and stop acting like rational adults. It would confuse the adults around them because as far as they were concerned their adult friend/coworker/spouse was still there but his mind was hijacked, much like invasion of the body snatchers. He called these ‚Äúslips‚Äù games thus the ***theory of human gaming***.

What are the supposed games people play?
The subject is too lengthy to detail here. The book is an easy read if you are curious.
Here are a few game titles to give you the general flavor.

"Now I've Got You, You Son of a Bitch,"
"Why does this always happen to me?‚Äù
‚ÄúSee what you made me do‚Äù
‚ÄúIf it weren't for you‚Äù
‚ÄúLook how hard I've tried‚Äù
‚ÄúLet's you and him fight‚Äù
and my favorite
‚ÄúLet's pull a fast one on Joey‚Äù

The titles are clever summations of the games as if a child would name them since it is the child ego state that initiates them.

These games often have tragic ends such as divorce, jail, the hospital, or the morgue for one or both of the people involved. The really alarming part is that *_*the initiator of the game does not even realize what he/she is doing_**. It is all subconscious. So when I tell you it is possible for adults to slip into a child ego state it is not speculation on my part. In fact, like VAERS underreporting, this is more than common ‚Äì it should be expected ‚Äì even without deliberate hypnotism.

Joe South understood the 3 ego states. He may not have delineated them as such but he definitely had insight into some of the dynamics of the interactions.

‚ÄúOh we make one another cry
Break a heart then we say goodbye
Cross our hearts and we hope to die
That the other was to blame‚Äù

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cFK9MIS-5nc

What you have just learned in the last 2 lessons is the key to illuminati mind control.

Now let me prove it.

https://gab.com/thelastfreemindinapostQworld/posts/107761238361318036
